info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Schenectady, northeastern Schoharie and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Central Bridge, or 11 miles northeast of Cobleskill, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban/poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Duanesburg, Delanson, Central Bridge, Charleston, Esperance, Old Central Bridge, Rockwell Corners, Scotch Bush, Grovenor Corners, Young Corners, Lost Valley, Market Corners, Quaker Street, Becker Corners, Davis Corners, Mariaville, Rynex Corners, Burtonsville, Minaville and Eaton Corners. This includes Interstate 88 near exit 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
